paramInformation.label: Send Multi Level Report On State Change
paramInformation.description: Report percentage when level changes, unit is 1%

paramInformation.label: Over Current Protection
paramInformation.description: Triggered when module goes over current limit.

paramInformation.label: Start Positioning Calibration
paramInformation.description: ONLY VALID IN SHUTTER WITH POSITIONING MODE. Enable to begin, will revert to Disabled once completed.

paramInformation.label: Configuration Of Momentary Switch Inputs
paramInformation.description: ONLY VALID IN LIGHT MODE. Switch inputs accept a variety of push combinations (press, hold & released), configure how the outputs react to them here.

options.label: All The Same, Toggle The Respective Output
Short Press Only, Toggle The Respective Output
Hold & Release Only, Toggle The Respective Output
Short Press Only, Toggle Both Outputs
Hold & Release Only, Toggle Both Outputs

paramInformation.label: Enable Inclusion / Exclusion Using External Switch On Input S1
Enable / Disable Sending Of Central Scene Commands In Response To Inputs
paramInformation.description: Switch inputs accept a variety of push combinations (press, hold & released), configure if Central Scene Commands are sent in response to them.

paramInformation.label: Power Report Absolute Threshold
paramInformation.description: Report when power changes by W value, unit is 1W.

paramInformation.label: Current Report Absolute Threshold
paramInformation.description: Report when current changes by A value, unit is 0.1A.

paramInformation.label: Voltage Report Absolute Threshold
paramInformation.description: Report when voltage changes by V value, unit is 1V.

paramInformation.label: Slats Rotation Time
paramInformation.description: ONLY VALID IN SHUTTER WITH POSITIONING MODE. Time taken to rotate slats before blind starts to move, unit is 0.1S.

paramInformation.label: Report Interval
paramInformation.description: Time cycle to report the values of energy consumption, voltage, current and load power.

metadata.inclusion:
Step 1. Set primary controller/gateway into inclusion mode.
Step 2. Either power cycle the product, or triple press the action button.
 Step 3. The connected light will stay on solid for 3 seconds to indicate successful inclusion.
metadata.exclusion:
Step 1. Set primary controller/gateway into exclusion mode.
Step 2. Triple press the action button.
metadata.reset: Press and hold the action button for over 10 seconds.
